entry.title: Honey, I Love You
entry.summary: This is the third book in the series called The Misadventures Of Little Toast. These are picture books about the misadventures of a little baby girl. Baby is jealous of Papa's name. Read to find out why.

entry.title: Buttered Toast Is Good!
entry.summary: This is the second book in the series called The Misadventures Of Little Toast. These are picture books about the misadventures of a little baby girl. Baby's interpretation of what will make Mama happy is sure to drive Mama crazy!

entry.title: What's My Name?
entry.summary: This is the first book in the series called The Misadventures Of Little Toast. These are picture books about the misadventures of a little baby girl. Baby is too young to talk. But she is trying to figure out her name from everything she hears her parents say.
